<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get consent"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/receiver/data/v3/consent/{consentPactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint that our client can call to get a Consent's data by its PactualId:
    
* Open Finance endpoint that will be requested: ```(GET /consents/{consentId})```
    
* FamilyType: ```Consentimento``` 
    
The response content provided by this endpoint uses the same entity as the provided on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/345866622/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Consentimento+-+v3.0.0).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
